item.title: Python Notes, Part 1 - Data Model
item.description: One of the best things about python is it’s consistency. Once someone has spent enough time with python and it’s ecosystem, they tend to adapt easily to new tools, modules as long as they are written in a pythonic way. What is considered pythonic is a very subjective matter, but we can always look at the “Zen of Python” for some guidance. 1 import this The Zen of Python, by Tim Peters Beautiful is better than ugly.
